Text: This is Ubuntu. WTF? Linux distribution isn`t made with remastersys, live scrips, builder or reconstructor.  You can name it how ever you wan but this is still Ubuntu not a Linux distribution. Thous tools are not for making Linux disributions, they are for personalizing a Ubuntu live cd. And that is what you did. Linux distribution is made by joining together kernel, linker, gcc, glibc, shell, init scripts. When you do that then you can say yoo have made a Linux distribution. But until then you are just trolling with Ubuntu like everyone else.
